channel.title: Work on Brian Liston | Digital Design and Video Production in Denver, Colorado
channel.description: Recent content in Work on Brian Liston | Digital Design and Video Production in Denver, Colorado

item.title: Kickstarter videos and design for Artana Games
item.description:
Powering Up! is an expansion to the hit board game Tesla vs. Edison. Funded over 3000%, Powering Up! raised 3/4ths the money of its base game, Tesla vs. Edison.

For this Kickstarter campaign, I created the video, campaign images, and other marketing assets.

item.title: Article Design and Illustration for Involution Studios
item.description: Disrupt! is Involution Studio’s Summer 2015 feature article which explores the historical evolution of technology and UX, and posits that we’re in the midst of a third Industrial Revolution.

item.title: Case Study Video for Involution Studios
item.description: DataXu had a unique vision to be a leader in the big data game. Thanks to the Involution Studios redesign that data now gives their clients many recommendations and methods to forecast, in real time, anytime. I shot and edited this video.

item.title: Digital and Print Design for Involution Studios
item.description: Involution Studios, a UX design agency working in the healthcare space, was founded in 2004 in Palo Alto, CA. I worked with Involution for two years creating marketing assets.

item.title: Book Trailers
item.description: Authors Jon Follett and Matthew Holm contacted me to create a trailer for their latest book. The project time frame was short–the book release was only two weeks away.

item.title: Documentary for The Ohio Center for Extra-scientific Research
item.description: The Ohio Center for Extrascientific Research or The OCER is a fictional organization inspired by reality TV shows like Ghosthunters and River Monsters and alternative media like Coast to Coast AM and Infowars.

item.title: Music Video for Fine Animal
item.description: Observe Arts was a video production project started by myself and designer Owen Carstensen. Observe created projections for Columbus-based band Fine Animal’s album release show and documented their performance.

item.title: TotalGrow Product Video for Venntis Technologies
item.description: TotalGrow lighting uses a new LED technology which only emits light at the wavelengths most advantageous for plant growth.

item.title: Website for The Xavier Lab
item.description: The Xavier Lab at Massachusetts General Hospital and the Broad Institute needed to refresh their web presence. They had the content, their problem was its presentation. Their website was information rich, but ugly and difficult to keep updated.
